deployStableSwapPool(address,address,add.details: From the curve documentation for uncollateralized algorithmic stablecoins amplification should be 5-10

params._amplificationCoefficient: amplification coefficient. The smaller it is the closer to a constant product we are.
params._crvBasePool: Address of the base pool to use within the new metapool.
params._fee: Trade fee, given as an integer with 1e10 precision.

setBondingContractAddress(address).details: bonding contract participants deposit  curve LP token for a certain duration to earn uGOV and more curve LP token

setTreasuryAddress(address).details: the treasury fund is used to maintain the protocol

deployStableSwapPool(address,address,add.notice: deploy a new Curve metapools for uAD Token uAD/3Pool

setBondingContractAddress(address).notice: set the bonding bontract smart contract address
